The wait is finally over, today’s the day! 

Join us today at 3:00 PM (GST) for Live with ExCom, an hour of transparency, clarity, and connection with our ExCom members.

We’ve heard from our ExCom members all week — now it’s their time to dedicate a full hour answering all your questions. Missed any of the videos? Catch up on them before we go live here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1357&user=10620> .

Haven’t registered yet? There’s still time, register here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1358&user=10620> 

Let’s come together, to look ahead to the second half of the year and

build a future where luxury dreams become reality.
